name: DEWALT 4-1/2 Inch Cut-Off Wheel, Angle Grinder Cutting Disc, General Purpose, 4-Pack (DW8062B5)
short_description: More Cuts. Fewer Wheels.TM

50% Longer Life* Replace wheels less often with Temper Point grains that are tougher and razor sharp for more cuts. Better adhesion between the coated grains and resin creates a longer lasting cutting edge that wears slowly.
Extremely Versatile: Efficiently cut a wide range of metals including carbon steel, stainless and nickel-based alloys.
Aggressive Cutting Action: Make fast cuts with a thin wheel design and high-grain concentration.
Durable By Design: Built with two sheets of fiberglass for wheel strength. Designed to reduce wheel breakage.
Cuts steel, angle iron, pipe, tubing, rebar
product_description: Replace wheels less often with Temper Point TM grains that are built tougher to maintain razor sharpness for up to 50% longer life. Get a longer lasting cutting edge that resists wear-and-tear with enhanced adhesion between the coated grains and resin. Efficiently cut a wide range of metals including carbon steel, stainless, and nickel-based alloys with the wheels thin designs and high-grain concentration. These wheels are exceptionally durable and are built with 2 sheets of fiberglass for optimized strength to help to reduce breakage.

name: Benchmark Abrasives Grinder Cut Off Wheels 4 1/2 Inch Aluminum Oxide Thin Type 1 Angle Grinder Cutting Disc for Metal, Stainless Steel - with 7/8" Arbor Hole, Fast Grinder Cutting Wheel - 50 Count
short_description: “ 4 1/2 GRINDING WHEELS: Benchmark Abrasives cutoff wheels featuring a 4-1/2" diameter and 7/8" arbor, are Ideal for cutting metal, steel, pipes, tubes, stainless steel, cast iron, rebar and much more abrasive operations. Achieve clean, precise cuts for general metal fabrication with our cut-off wheels.

FLAT DESIGN FOR OPTIMAL GRINDING: Our high-performance Type 1 cutting wheels are completely flat, making them perfect for grinding operations. The metal cutting disc is made of aluminum oxide grains for consistent, sharp, burr-free cutting. Optimize your grinding tasks using these grinder wheels with ease and efficiency.

EFFICIENT GRINDER WHEEL: Our professional metal cut off wheel excels in various cutting operations on stainless steel, aluminum, and other metals. With high efficiency these cutting wheels 4 1/2 inch in size deliver up to 13,000 RPM and ensure smooth, vibration-free cuts. Get a high cutting rate and lower operational costs.

MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS & COMPATIBILITY: The cutoff wheel is compatible with 4-1/2 inch and 5 inch angle grinders, as well as die grinders, high-speed saws, stationary saws, and chop saws. Crafted from high-speed steel material, the grinder disc is designed to last. This angle grinder metal cutting disc fits Dewalt, Milwaukee, Makita, Bosch, Metabo, Ryobi, Black & Decker, Kobalt, Craftsman, Skil, Porter Cable, Ridgid, 4-½ & 5 inch angle grinders, and virtually all other brands.

CUT OFF WHEEL YOU CAN TRUST: Our 4.5 inch cut off wheels are manufactured with premium materials that exceed ANSI and EU European standards. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality cut-off wheels to our customers. Your satisfaction is our priority and the lifeline of our brand. Enjoy the confidence of using angle grinder attachments that professionals trust.

name: Cut Off Wheels 4-1/2", PRETEC 50+5 Pack Metal Cutting Wheel,Thin 4.5” Metal & Stainless Steel Fast Cutting Discs for Angle Grinder - 7/8" Arbor Hole
short_description: 【Fits All 4-1/2 Inch Angle Grinders】 PRETEC Cut Off Wheel is compatible with all 4-1/2 inch angle grinders with 7/8 inch arbor. The high rotating speed of up to 13,300 RPM, more than common 13,000 RPM, ensure maximum efficiency.

【High-Quality and Durable】 Made from corundum and white alundum grain, PRETEC 4 1/2 Cutting Wheels are designed to provide high hardness, durability, and abrasion resistance. These features not only extend the wheel's service life but also ensure your safety during use.

【Sharp and Clean Cut】 PRETEC's 0.04 inch ultra-thin 4.5 Cut Off Wheel for Metal offer fast burr-free and stable cutting, allowing you to make precise and efficient cuts in steel, stainless steel, and other ferrous metals. The discs' unique design promotes heat dissipation, avoiding metal thermal burns, and reducing material loss during cutting.

【Professional Certification】 Our Cut Off Wheels 4 1/2 inch hold CE and ISO certifications, ensuring the highest safety and quality standards. With these credentials, you can be confident in using PRETEC cutoff wheels 4 1/2 inch for cutting stainless steel, aluminum alloy, cast iron, carbon steel, and general-purpose metal.

【Multiple Uses】 These 4 1/2 cut off wheels are perfect for various cutting projects, such as cutting steel, iron, fiberglass, plastic, stainless steel including rebar, steel pipe, sheet metal, and structural tubing. With our 4.5 inch cut off wheels, you can achieve exceptional results in all your cutting needs.
